channel.title: -Has advanced ... -skill- text pi 317
channel.description:
Hello people, How can i make it so that when someone reaches a 99 it yells it through my server?
also, that when a staff logs in, like
Aggroth has just logged in!

item.title: -Has advanced ... -skill- text pi 317
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

ill help ya out i guess first go to your playerassistant.java and search for this

then this is where you actually have to do some stuff yourself ill give you the first example. this would be the code for defence

case 1: // Defence sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a Defence level!", 6254); sendFrame126("Your Defence level is now " + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) + ".", 6255); c.sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a Defence level."); sendFrame164(6253); if (getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) <= 98) break; for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] == null) continue; Client all = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; all.sendMessage("<shad=16745472>[Server]</col><shad=65288> " + c.playerName + " has just achieved level " + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) + " Defence!"); //theres your yell to everybody } c.sendMessage("Congratulations you have reached level 99 in Defence!"); c.getItems().addItem(9754, 1); c.getItems().addItem(9755, 1); break;

now its basically the same for all the other skills you just have to change the case number to the skill number (should already be in there for each skill anyway so just edit the existing ones) and change the defence name to the other skill name…thats if your just going to copy paste…but you should really read the code and try to figure out what its saying and try to learn it. its really basic.

Read full topic
